name: Tapfiliate
natural_language_description: 这是 Tapfiliate 节点。主要用于: Consume Tapfiliate API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: affiliate | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add
available_options: Add (值: add) - Add affiliate to program
Approve (值: approve) - Approve an affiliate for a program
Get (值: get) - Get an affiliate in a program
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many affiliates in program

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The affiliate’s email | (必填项)

firstname.name: firstname
firstname.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: The affiliate’s firstname | (必填项)

lastname.name: lastname
lastname.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: The affiliate’s lastname | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: approved (值: None) - An optional approval status
coupon (值: None) - An optional coupon for this affiliate

affiliateId.name: affiliateId
affiliateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Affiliate ID | 作用: The ID of the affiliate | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: affiliate_group_id (值: None) - Retrieves affiliates for a certain affiliate group
parentId (值: None) - Retrieves children for a certain parent affiliate

metadataUi.name: metadataUi
metadataUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Metadata | 作用: Meta data | 默认值: {}

key.name: key
key.description: Name of the metadata key to update
key.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key | 作用: Name of the metadata key to update

value.name: value
value.description: Value to set for the metadata key
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: Value to set for the metadata key

programId.name: programId
programId.description: The ID of the Program to add the affiliate to. This ID can be found as part of the URL when viewing the program on the platform. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
programId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Program Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the Program to add the affiliate to. This ID can be found as part of the URL when viewing the program on the platform. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)
